https://tmrev.io/movie/201858-Boney M: The Magic of Boney M. 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yYebnPRIYfYb48Gl75Tb8R4i9za.jpg Boney M were a male/female Euro-disco quartet who were put together by producer/writer Frank Farian to perform the commercial songs he had been writing. The foursome came together in 1976 and went on to score numerous chart hits including a few singles that are still amongst the biggest selling records of all time in the UK. This DVD features 20 video clips and performances by Boney M including 'Rivers Of Babylon', 'Mary's Boy Child/Oh My Lord', 'Ma Baker', 'Daddy Cool' and more. Sony/BMG. 2006. Boney M: The Magic of Boney M.
